company_attributes.name: Autonomy
company_attributes.description: The ability to work independently and make decisions without constant supervision.

scale.min_description: Requires constant supervision and guidance.
scale.max_description: Highly self-directed and capable of working independently.

company_attributes.score_explanation: The company values autonomy highly, as indicated by their emphasis on independence.

company_attributes.name: Bluntness
company_attributes.description: The tendency to be straightforward and direct in communication.

scale.min_description: Avoids direct communication and is often vague.
scale.max_description: Extremely straightforward and direct in communication.

company_attributes.score_explanation: The company explicitly values bluntness, requiring employees to be straight to the point.

company_attributes.name: Ability to Take Feedback
company_attributes.description: The capacity to accept and act on feedback constructively.

scale.min_description: Resistant to feedback and unwilling to change.
scale.max_description: Highly receptive to feedback and willing to make changes.

company_attributes.score_explanation: The company places a strong emphasis on the ability to take in feedback.

company_attributes.name: Adaptability
company_attributes.description: The ability to adjust to new conditions and changes quickly.

scale.min_description: Struggles with change and prefers routine.
scale.max_description: Highly adaptable and thrives in changing environments.

company_attributes.score_explanation: Adaptability is a core value, essential for the fast-paced and dynamic work environment.

company_attributes.name: Agreeableness
company_attributes.description: The tendency to be pleasant and accommodating in social situations.

scale.min_description: Often confrontational and uncooperative.
scale.max_description: Highly cooperative and pleasant in social interactions.

company_attributes.score_explanation: The company values bluntness over agreeableness, indicating a neutral stance.

company_attributes.name: Neuroticism
company_attributes.description: The tendency to experience negative emotions easily.

scale.min_description: Rarely experiences negative emotions.
scale.max_description: Frequently experiences negative emotions.

company_attributes.score_explanation: The fast-paced and fun environment suggests a low tolerance for high neuroticism.

company_attributes.name: Conscientiousness
company_attributes.description: The tendency to be organized and dependable.

scale.min_description: Disorganized and unreliable.
scale.max_description: Highly organized and dependable.

company_attributes.score_explanation: The environment is described as slightly messy, indicating moderate conscientiousness.

company_attributes.name: Openness to Experience
company_attributes.description: Willingness to try new things and be intellectually curious.

scale.min_description: Prefers routine and avoids new experiences.
scale.max_description: Highly curious and eager to try new things.

company_attributes.score_explanation: The mission and vision require a high level of openness to new experiences.

company_attributes.name: Extraversion
company_attributes.description: The tendency to seek stimulation in the company of others.

scale.min_description: Prefers solitude and avoids social interactions.
scale.max_description: Highly sociable and seeks out social interactions.

company_attributes.score_explanation: The fun environment suggests a moderate level of extraversion.

company_attributes.name: Introversion
company_attributes.description: The tendency to be inwardly focused and less socially engaged.

scale.min_description: Highly sociable and seeks out social interactions.
scale.max_description: Prefers solitude and avoids social interactions.

company_attributes.score_explanation: The fun and fast-paced environment suggests a lower level of introversion.

company_attributes.name: Assertiveness
company_attributes.description: Confidence in expressing one's thoughts and opinions.

scale.min_description: Avoids expressing thoughts and opinions.
scale.max_description: Highly confident in expressing thoughts and opinions.

company_attributes.score_explanation: Bluntness and direct communication require high assertiveness.

company_attributes.name: Passive-aggressiveness
company_attributes.description: Indirect expression of hostility.

scale.min_description: Direct and straightforward in communication.
scale.max_description: Often expresses hostility indirectly.

company_attributes.score_explanation: The value of bluntness suggests a low tolerance for passive-aggressiveness.

company_attributes.name: Humility
company_attributes.description: A modest view of one's own importance.

scale.min_description: Highly self-important and arrogant.
scale.max_description: Modest and humble.

company_attributes.score_explanation: The emphasis on feedback suggests a moderate level of humility.

company_attributes.name: Creativity
company_attributes.description: The ability to think outside the box and generate innovative ideas.

scale.min_description: Prefers conventional approaches.
scale.max_description: Highly innovative and creative.

company_attributes.score_explanation: The mission and vision require high levels of creativity.

company_attributes.name: Risk-taking
company_attributes.description: Willingness to take risks and face challenges.

scale.min_description: Avoids risks and prefers safety.
scale.max_description: Highly willing to take risks.

company_attributes.score_explanation: The mission to Mars and fast-paced environment require high risk-taking.

company_attributes.name: Teamwork
company_attributes.description: The ability to work well with others.

scale.min_description: Prefers to work alone and struggles with collaboration.
scale.max_description: Highly collaborative and works well in teams.

company_attributes.score_explanation: The emphasis on autonomy suggests a balanced approach to teamwork.

company_attributes.name: Attention to Detail
company_attributes.description: The ability to notice and consider small details.

scale.min_description: Overlooks details and focuses on the big picture.
scale.max_description: Highly attentive to small details.

company_attributes.score_explanation: The slightly messy environment suggests a neutral stance on attention to detail.

company_attributes.name: Resilience
company_attributes.description: The ability to recover quickly from difficulties.

scale.min_description: Struggles to recover from setbacks.
scale.max_description: Highly resilient and recovers quickly from difficulties.

company_attributes.score_explanation: The fast-paced environment requires high resilience.

company_attributes.name: Work Ethic
company_attributes.description: The belief in the value of hard work and diligence.

scale.min_description: Lacks motivation and avoids hard work.
scale.max_description: Highly motivated and diligent.

company_attributes.score_explanation: The fast-paced and quick-acting environment requires a strong work ethic.

company_attributes.name: Flexibility
company_attributes.description: The ability to adapt to new situations and changes.

scale.min_description: Prefers routine and struggles with change.
scale.max_description: Highly adaptable and flexible.

company_attributes.score_explanation: Flexibility is essential in the company's dynamic environment.
